[00:00.00]Long Live - Florida Georgia Line
[00:04.75]Lyrics by：Corey Crowder/Tyler Hubbard/Brian Kelley/David Garcia/Josh Miller
[00:09.51]Composed by：Corey Crowder/Tyler Hubbard/Brian Kelley/David Garcia/Josh Miller
[00:14.26]It's a Friday night
[00:16.69]We circled up
[00:18.35]It's going down round these pickup trucks
[00:21.64]Yeah it's cold cans and Dixie cups
[00:25.46]Just out here doing what we've always done
[00:28.46]Long live all the small towners
[00:31.02]Sunup to sundowners
[00:32.97]That old school Haggard and Hank
[00:36.06]Long live longneck bottles
[00:38.50]And wide-open throttles
[00:40.21]And old dirt roads with no name
[00:43.78]Long live them country girls
[00:45.59]Long legs in cut up jeans
[00:47.86]Long live this way of life
[00:49.74]Long live nights like these
[00:52.78]Long live

[00:14.26]这个周五晚上
[00:16.69]开着皮卡兜风
[00:18.35]我们相聚一堂
[00:21.64]尽情放松吃喝
[00:25.46]我们一贯如此
[00:28.46]让我们为小镇居民
[00:31.02]勤劳之人
